document_data.name: Elthira Gossen
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''Elthira Gossen''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] who served the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Don't look down your nose - it's gotta be done. Followers of the Absolute are everywhere.''|Fist Gossen}}
document_data.Description: Elthira was a zealous [[human]] woman with dark freckled skin and brown eyes. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist â€“ a [[helmet]], a set of [[chainmail]], and a [[tabard]] adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia. She wielded a massive [[halberd]] in battle.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Elthira Gossen was tasked with patrolling the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]], near the [[Basilisk Gate]]. Her zealous attempts to protect the city from the agents of the encroaching army of [[Absolutist]]s led to harassment common folk who happened to strike suspicion in the Fist. Some of the people harassed by Elthira were [[Drongo Bixworth]] and his husband, [[Florean Bixworth]], who were detained and interrogated for the crime of loitering.
